snippet.title: Memory's Reach Zone Preview: Kogil Rainforest
snippet.description:
Explore the Kogil Rainforest, a massive scientific facility used to monitor the life signs of the lost planet of Virishal.

Memory’s Reach is a first person puzzle-adventure metroidvania. Explore labyrinthian megastructures, solve mind-bending puzzles, and wield fantastic alien technology in a quest to reveal the legacy of a doomed civilization. 

Play the pre-alpha demo, now available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2126810/Memorys_Reach

Learn more at:
https://www.memorysreach.com
